short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Monitors traffic from the current active tab and logs them to a list that can easily be exported as a CSV!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension captures network traffic from the current active tab, logging each request into a comprehensive list. The logged data includes key details such as the type of HTTP request (e.g., POST, GET, IMAGE, etc.), as well as the precise timestamp when each request was made. Additionally, this list can be easily exported in CSV format, allowing users to save and analyze their browsing activity data for future reference, security auditing, or other safekeeping purposes.
